questions.question: This AI technique involves training a model on a large dataset to make predictions or decisions without being explicitly programmed.
This type of AI is designed to perform a narrow task, such as facial recognition or internet searches.
This term refers to the ability of an AI system to understand and generate human language.
This AI technique involves using a network of artificial neurons to recognize patterns and make decisions.
This term refers to the hypothetical future point at which AI will surpass human intelligence.
